subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers were tied, 1-1, when they were undone once again by their inept power play, with Brandon Sutter scoring a short-handed goal late in the second period.
snippet: The Rangers were tied, 1-1, when they were undone once again by their inept power play, with Brandon Sutter scoring a short-handed goal late in the second period.
